metadata.title: CVE-2018-10322 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
The xfs_dinode_verify function in fs/xfs/libxfs/xfs_inode_buf.c in theLinux kernel through 4.16.3 allows local users to cause a denial of service(xfs_ilock_attr_map_shared invalid pointer dereference) via a crafted xfsimage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10322` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-192.222
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-192.222
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-192.222
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.2.0-1013-raspi2 - 4.4.0-1140.149
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1012-snapdragon - 4.4.0-1144.153
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1116.129
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-119.120~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.15.0-119.120~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.15.0-119.120~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.15.0-1097.107~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1099-gcp - 4.15.0-1085.96~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1081.89
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1084.88~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1071-oracle - 4.15.0-1055.59~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
